    • Method Detail

      • onHotspotReached

        public void onHotspotReached(String id)
        Callback method for when an hotspot is reached.

        This method immediately throws CHotspotError in case the hotspot is a CNever hotspot. Otherwise, it just marks the hotspot as reached.

        Parameters:
        id - Hotspot id.
        Throws:
        CHotspotError - if the hotspot is a CNever hotspot.

      • startTestTrial

        public void startTestTrial()
        Method that should be called at the start of a test trial.

      • endTestTrial

        public void endTestTrial()
        Method that should be called at the end of a test trial.
        Throws:
        CHotspotError - if one or more CAlways hotspots have not been reached.
        See Also:
        CAlways

      • endTestSession

        public void endTestSession()
        Method that should be called at the end of a test session.
        Throws:
        CHotspotError - if one or more CSometimes hotspots have not been reached.
        See Also:
        CSometimes
